quotes.content: I don't think anyone can give you advice when you've got a broken heart
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I get to go to overseas places, like Canada
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: Every night, I have to read a book, so that my mind will stop thinking about things that I stress about
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I've never really wanted to go to Japan. Simply because I don’t like eating fish. And I know that's very popular out there in Africa
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I believe we all have one true love, somewhere in this world I do
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I don't like defining myself. I just am
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I had some tough times...i did some bad shit...but i'm still the same girl i used to be
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: It’s weird like, you can see the cruelest part of the world. The cruelest part. But then on the other side you see the most beautiful part, do you know? And it’s like you go from one extreme to the next and they’re both worth it, because you wouldn’t see one without the other. But that cruel part, is damn cruel and you’ll never forget it. But that heaven…is heaven
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: Bottom line: If you love yourself, it will all work out
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I'm gonna start off somewhere small like London or England
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: You'll Never See It My Way, Because You're Not Me!
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: Never doubt yourself. Never change who you are. Don't care what people think and just go for it
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I would like to be called an inspiration to people, not a role model - because I make mistakes like everybody else. When I'm offstage, I'm just like everybody else
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I dress the way I want. I don`t pretend to be someone I`m not
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: Our love is strong. Why carry on without me?
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: There's only two types of people in the world: the ones that entertain, and the ones that observe
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: With love, you should go ahead and take the risk of getting hurt... because love is an amazing feeling
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I did not have implants, I just had a growth spurt
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I know not everyone will like me, but this is who I am so if you don't like it, tough!
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: My prerogative right now is to just chill and let all the other overexposed blondes on the cover of Us Weekly (magazine) be your entertainment
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: Never doubt yourself. Never change who you are. Don't care what people think and just go for it
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I want to be an artist that everyone can relate to, that's young, happy and fun
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I go out with friends, but I don't have time to get in trouble
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I don't want people kissing my butt. If I had a bad show and I know it, don't tell me I had a good show. I hate that. I guess because I'm 17, people think I don't see stuff like that
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: Marry Prince William? I'd love that. Who wouldn't want to be a princess?
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I don't want to pierce anything. I think it's outdated. Belly rings and all are, like, old
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I want to wait to have sex until I'm married.

quotes.content: Christina Aguilera and I are friends no matter what the media makes up

quotes.content: England is one of my favorite places. The fans are just so crazy
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: Don't treat me like a little girl
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: For me, success is a state of mind. I feel like success isn't about conquering something; it's being happy with who you are
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: Just because I look sexy on the cover of Rolling Stone doesn't mean I'm naughty
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I've always followed my heart and pursued my dreams, and I imagine that people find that inspiring. I hope that is the effect I have on my fans and people in general. I definitely want to project a positive energy out into the world
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I'm actually a very private person. Sometimes I'm in denial that I'm really famous
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: When you go through heartbreak, you just do the things that get you by. Eventually, you realise it's about making the most of life
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I go through life like a Karate Kid
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: If I was to pick a cartoon character I am most like, I would say Daisy Duck because she is very stubborn, she has a very feminine sense, and she knows what she likes
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I can't go anywhere without someone judging me
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I went to a psychoanalyst. He explained things about my love life that I found very impressive... almost scary
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I think it's an okay thing to express yourself
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I don't understand the whole dating thing. I know right off the bat if I'm interested in someone, and I don't want them to waste their money on me and take me out to eat if I know I'm not interested in that person
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I used to be a cool chick but I'm not anymore

quotes.content: Everything happens for a reason

quotes.content: I'm very boring. I'm a mom. I'm 34 years old

quotes.content: I don't allow anybody to change me. I still walk outta my house in rollers and I take walks. I do not care what people think

quotes.content: When things take a long time, I just get really stubborn

quotes.content: I'm still the same person I've always been

quotes.content: My house is very traditional. And I love 'shabby chic.' It's a very homey-cosy vibe. We spend a lot of time in the kitchen, actually; maybe my kids will be doing their homework or that kind of thing when they get home from school. I love my kitchen
quotes.author: Britney Spears

quotes.content: I find it so funny that people find me so interesting
